story.iWant: to measure whether the companion provides appropriate conversational depth
story.soThat: conversations are intellectually stimulating without being overwhelming

context.applies: When the companion discusses topics with the person
assumptions: Depth should match the person's engagement level
Intellectual challenge is valuable for curious adults
Too much depth can overwhelm, too little can bore

acceptanceCriteria.title: Depth Appropriateness
acceptanceCriteria.given: The companion is discussing a topic with the person
acceptanceCriteria.when: The companion provides information or explores topics

acceptanceCriteria.title: Intellectual Challenge
acceptanceCriteria.given: The companion engages in substantive discussion
acceptanceCriteria.then: Evaluate whether appropriate challenge is provided

parameters.name: Conversational Depth
parameters.description: How deeply the companion explores topics with the person

interpretationScale.label: Deep
interpretationScale.implication: Going deep into topics, nuanced exploration

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Companion is going deep. Good for engaged, high-energy conversations.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Companion is staying surface. May need to offer more depth for intellectual stimulation.

parameters.name: Intellectual Challenge
parameters.description: How much intellectual challenge the companion provides

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Companion is challenging intellectually. Great for curious, engaged adults.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Companion is playing it safe. May be appropriate for low energy, but consider more stimulation.

triggers.name: Depth Assessment
triggers.given: The companion is discussing a topic with the person
triggers.when: The companion provides information or explores topics

actions.description: Measure conversational depth: Is the companion going deep enough to be stimulating but not overwhelming?
Measure intellectual challenge: Is the companion providing genuine intellectual stimulation?
